name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
description: Premium wireless headphones with active noise cancellation and 30-hour battery life. Features premium audio drivers, comfortable memory foam ear cushions, and seamless Bluetooth 5.0 connectivity. Perfect for music lovers, professionals, and travelers.

name: Smart Fitness Watch
description: Advanced fitness tracking smartwatch with heart rate monitor, GPS, and water resistance. Features a bright AMOLED display, 7-day battery life, and comprehensive health metrics tracking. Perfect for athletes and health-conscious individuals.

name: Organic Cotton T-Shirt
description: Comfortable and sustainable organic cotton t-shirt made from 100% certified organic cotton. Available in multiple colors and sizes. Features a classic fit, reinforced stitching, and eco-friendly production process. Perfect for everyday wear.

specifications.care: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low

name: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
description: Premium insulated stainless steel water bottle with double-wall vacuum insulation. Keeps drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours. Features a leak-proof design, BPA-free construction, and wide mouth for easy cleaning.

name: Wireless Charging Pad
description: Fast wireless charging pad compatible with all Qi-enabled devices. Features 15W fast charging, LED indicator lights, and non-slip silicone surface. Includes overcharge protection and temperature control for safe charging.

name: Yoga Mat Premium
description: High-quality yoga mat made from eco-friendly TPE material. Features excellent grip, cushioning, and durability. Perfect for yoga, pilates, and fitness activities. Includes carrying strap and is available in multiple colors.

name: Smart LED Light Bulb
description: WiFi-enabled smart LED light bulb with 16 million colors and voice control. Compatible with Alexa, Google Assistant, and Apple HomeKit. Features scheduling, dimming, and energy-efficient operation. Perfect for smart home automation.

name: Portable Bluetooth Speaker
description: Waterproof portable Bluetooth speaker with 360-degree sound and 20-hour battery life. Features built-in microphone for calls, rugged design for outdoor use, and wireless stereo pairing. Perfect for parties, outdoor activities, and travel.
